Text: you can use wii games manager to convert iso to wbfs.and u can certainly use wii backup manager to add wbfs files to an external hd as long as it is formatted as wbfs.

It works for me on my 4.3E with USB Loader GX but I converted the wbfs to iso with Wii Game Converter GXS and used WBFS Manager to load it on the drive.

Cheers Wiiman1982
